Guest House of Jeger

The task was to design a one-story building, for temporary residence of a small group of hunters or fishermen (up to 4 people).

It was necessary to create a closet for storing outerwear in the entrance hallway and to design a terrace or cold veranda. It was also possible to add an observation tower.

The project is inspired by the works of Frank Lloyd Wright.

Used programs:

  • Autocad
  • Photoshop
